title: 038: Ninetales
author: Chris Taylor
description:
Long ago, in the bowels of the void seven deadly wizards came together to save the world. Their combined might created a creature so undescribable, so undefinable, it took 5 random dudes talking about Pokemon to really conceptualize what this creature is – WIZARDS, MAGIC, MIND CONTROL! Enjoy.  

Hosts: [Chris](https://twitter.com/DaLiquidSword), [Aleksandar](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC56emXYp1pHXL2E9SLcYisw), [Ethan](https://twitter.com/SynSpawn), [Mark](https://www.twitch.tv/robobobatron)

For more episodes and the full ranking list visit [Magmar Sucks](http://www.magmarsucks.com) on the web.

For more on the Pokemon in this episode check out their [Bulbapedia page](http://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Ninetales_(Pokémon))
